Package it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard.resourceLocations

Class Warehouse

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard.resourceLocations.Warehouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceLocation
public class Warehouse extends Object implements ResourceLocation
Warehouse is the class for the player board's warehouse

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Warehouse()
    The constructor initializes depots to contain three empty Depots of capacity respectively 1, 2, 3 and initializes initialDepots to 3

      addLeaderCardDepot adds a LeaderCardDepot to this Warehouse
      Parameters:
      leaderCardDepot - The LeaderCardDepot to add
      Throws:
      InvalidLeaderCardDepotException - leaderCardDepot is null

    • containsResources

      public boolean containsResources​(ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidResourceSetException
      containsResources checks whether a given ConcreteResourceSet is contained in this Warehouse
      Specified by:
      containsResources in interface ResourceLocation
      Parameters:
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to check
      Returns:
      True iff this Warehouse contains concreteResourceSet
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null

    • getResources

      public ConcreteResourceSet getResources()
      getResources returns a copy of the resources contained in this Warehouse
      Specified by:
      getResources in interface ResourceLocation
      Returns:
      A ConcreteResourceSet representing the resources in this Warehouse

    • canAdd

      public boolean canAdd​(int depotIndex, ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidDepotIndexException, InvalidResourceSetException
      canAdd checks whether a given ConcreteResourceSet can be added to a given Depot
      Parameters:
      depotIndex - The index of the Depot to check
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to check
      Returns:
      True iff concreteResourceSet can be added to the given Depot
      Throws:
      InvalidDepotIndexException - depotIndex is outside the range of depots
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null

    • addResources

      public void addResources​(int depotIndex, ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidDepotIndexException, InvalidResourceSetException, InvalidResourceLocationOperationException
      addResources adds a given ConcreteResourceSet to a given Depot
      Parameters:
      depotIndex - The index of the Depot to add resources into
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to add
      Throws:
      InvalidDepotIndexException - depotIndex is outside the range of depots
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null
      InvalidResourceLocationOperationException - concreteResourceSet cannot be added to the given Depot

    • removeResources

      public void removeResources​(int depotIndex, ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidDepotIndexException, InvalidResourceSetException, InvalidResourceLocationOperationException
      removeResources removes a given ConcreteResourceSet from a given Depot
      Parameters:
      depotIndex - The index of the Depot to remove resources from
      concreteResourceSet - The concreteResourceSet to remove
      Throws:
      InvalidDepotIndexException - depotIndex is outside the range of depots
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null
      InvalidResourceLocationOperationException - concreteResourceSet cannot be removed from the given Depot

    • canSwap

      public boolean canSwap​(int depotIndexA, int depotIndexB) throws InvalidDepotIndexException
      canSwap checks whether the resources in two given depots can be swapped
      Parameters:
      depotIndexA - The index of the first depot
      depotIndexB - The index of the second depot
      Returns:
      True iff the content of the two depots can be swapped
      Throws:
      InvalidDepotIndexException - depotIndexA or depotIndexB is outside the range of depots

    • swapResources

      public void swapResources​(int depotIndexA, int depotIndexB) throws InvalidDepotIndexException, InvalidResourceLocationOperationException
      swapResources swaps the content of two given depots
      Parameters:
      depotIndexA - The index of the first depot
      depotIndexB - The index of the second depot
      Throws:
      InvalidDepotIndexException - depotIndexA or depotIndexB is outside the range of depots
      InvalidResourceLocationOperationException - The content of the two depots cannot be swapped

    • getDepotResources

      public ConcreteResourceSet getDepotResources​(int depotIndex) throws InvalidDepotIndexException
      getDepotResources returns the resources contained in a given depot
      Parameters:
      depotIndex - The depot to get resources from
      Returns:
      The ConcreteResourceSet contained in the given depot
      Throws:
      InvalidDepotIndexException - depotIndex is outside the range of depots

      public int numberOfDepots()
      numberOfDepots returns the number of depots currently in this warehouse
      Returns:
      The size of depots
